product_name: Pedco Wrap Up / UltraPod Micro Tripod Combo - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Unwrap and shoot, wrap up and go! The Pedco Wrap Up / UltraPod Micro combo combines a camera case and tripod so you're always ready when a photo opportunity arises.
short_description: Unwrap and shoot, wrap up and go! The Pedco Wrap Up / UltraPod Micro combo combines a camera case and tripod so you're always ready when a photo opportunity arises.
